description:
Very few tools can assist your brand building efforts as can Powerpoint and Apple Presentations. Once your business document is created, are there other uses beyond initial audiences? The answer is yes and with the advent of document sharing websites, business presentations should be used to increase trust, credibility, website visits and profits for your company.

In this course, we teach you the following best practices for using Powerpoint presentations as a marketing tool;

1. Introduction to the Powerpoint Marketing landscape

2. Preparing effective back-linking strategies to increase website visits

3. Presentation sharing best practices to drive sales and profit results

4. Multiplying profits and website visits by using document sharing websites

5. Embedding video presentations to increase viewer engagement

6. Embedding presentations on business websites to increase click-thru rates

Take this course and learn how to immediately increase your website visits as well as super-charging sales and revenue results. Enroll NOW!
title: Business Marketing with Powerpoint
